Subject: PathologicalPathFilter for patterns including slashes
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=502027223; y=a_FNxOvg0hWgsNGqYbqgDs3cl3cfntb9yaJrp2FH_jn_wAZktblEJScFYvFMUl0Qr5qHqLoWt2rJxGk

Hi there

Looking at http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/fi=
lter/PathologicalPathFilter.html I get the impression that PathologicalPath=
Filter only matches repeating elements between slashes (e.g. /bla/bla/bla/)=
. Is this true? If yes: How would I automatically filter out more complex r=
epetitions like /bla/?id=3D27/bla/?id=3D27/bla/?id=3D27/ without having to =
specify the pattern?

Best,
Thomas
